Text: Eduardo started as one of the first employees in our growing IT team. His hands on mentality and his way of thinking along the features made him to a perfect fit in our team. He was able to understand requirements fast and knew how to bring them in context with the business goals. Through his deep understanding of design, he was able to implement features and to solve problems very quickly. Eduardo committed himself to every task and took over ownership for every project he was working on.

Trabalhei com o Eduardo por mais de 2 anos na Vérios. Muito objetivo, prático e atento aos incentivos financeiros que eram estabelecidos para a equipe de desenvolvimento do Comparação de Fundos. Capaz de entender a importância de novas funcionalidades e o cumprimento de prazos para o desenvolvimento do negócio.  Responsável e interessado, procurava resolver as principais demandas de tecnologia para melhoria do sistema que eram reportadas por clientes e profissionais do mercado financeiro. Excelente profissional.
